column2: We are now at the mercy of Prussia.
We are now free to follow another great power!
Another component of the wider German Nation has chosen to align themselves with our cause!"
Further Political Integration In Northern Germany

Prussia is destined to dominate and unify Germany. Our influence over the principalites and duchies of northern Germany have entrenched itself to such a degree that we may force political integration, if we disregard the international outrage...                             Note: Will integrate a random North German Sphereling that has been Sphered for 10 years, cost 5 infamy, and have a 1 year cooldown.

We can decide to devolve control over our colonial possesions in South East Asia to a Colonial Administration. It would mean giving up direct control over these colonies, but perhaps with our guidance, our intrests may be better served with this arrangement. Though we cannot be certain how this act may play out for us, we must let time lay this upon us in due time.

We can decide to devolve control over our colonial possesions in South East Asia to a Colonial Administration. It would mean giving up direct control over these colonies, but perhaps with our guidance, our intrests may be better served with this arrangement. Though we cannot be certain how this act may play out for us, we must let time lay this upon us in due time.
Reorganise our Johore and Brunei protectorates into a devolved Colonial Goverment

We will reorganise our protectorates over Johore and Brunei into a Malaysian Federation and devolve our control over its colonial administration. We will support the administration for some time, and we will retain economic control over the administration. Note: A player must be put on the colonial administration ASAP after releasing this tag, if not the tag will be reannexed into our country, in addition a GP can only release one colonial administration throughout the game!
Reorganise our Siamese protectorate into a devolved Colonial Goverment

Let us devolve control to our colonial administration in our Siamese protectorate. We will support the administration for some time, and we will retain economic control over the administration. Note: A player must be put on the colonial administration ASAP after releasing this tag, if not the tag will be reannexed into our country, in addition a GP can only release one colonial administration throughout the game!
Reorganise our Indochinese protectorates into a devolved Colonial Goverment

We will reorganise our protectorates in Indochina around a colonial administration in Saigon, and devolve control to this colonial administration. We will support the administration for some time, and we will retain economic control over the administration. Note: A player must be put on the colonial administration ASAP after releasing this tag, if not the tag will be reannexed into our country, in addition a GP can only release one colonial administration throughout the game!
Only a player can play this nation.
Colonial goverments are supposed to be player nations, dont create them if you dont have players ready to hop on them.

We have established control over crownlands formerly belonging to the Kingdom of Aceh Darussalam. Let us approach the now deposed sultan, and propose incorporation of his former kingdom into our federation of princely states.

Our lands have been under the influence of a foreign yoke, and our people has suffered as a consequence. It is time to rid us of deleterious influences, we must decolonise our country and promote a national identity if we are to prosper in these new times imposed by the foreigner.
China Base Research Points on Conquest
Be bold and restore the position of The Middle Kingdom!
Prussia is influencing our country, one day they might demand political integration.
We are applying pressure to the north german duchies and principalites to further their political integration with Prussia.
Two years of rpoints will be given.
Three years of rpoints will be given.
Our administration is staffed with professional foreign colonial bureaucrats from a great power.
